on reading compounds: 雪辱【セツジョク】vindication of honour, vindication of honor, making up for loss, revenge
雪山【ユキヤマ】snowy mountain, permanently snow-covered mountain, pile of snow, Himalayas
積雪【セキセツ】fallen snow, snow cover
融雪【ユウセツ】melted snow, melting of snow
kun reading compounds: 細雪【ささめゆき】light snow fall, small snow flakes
